function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Green space location influencing restorativeness","Impact":"Influences perceived restorativeness and wildlife support metrics, potentially affecting the well-being of people and wildlife.","Mitigation":"Strategic urban planning, preservation of peri-urban green spaces, and promotion of native species.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, urban design software, and ecological impact assessment tools.","People":"Urban planners, conservationists, community members, wildlife advocates.","Owner":"Local government, environmental organizations, urban planning departments."},{"Description":"Population density around green space affecting safety perception and wildlife richness","Impact":"Affects safety perception of green space users and influences the richness of bird and frog species. It may also impact the restorative experience of green spaces.","Mitigation":"Community engagement, strategic green space design, and wildlife habitat preservation.","Technologies":"Community survey tools, urban planning software, and wildlife monitoring technologies.","People":"Community members, urban planners, wildlife conservationists.","Owner":"Local government, community organizations, wildlife conservation groups."},{"Description":"Site-level factors and spatial configuration influencing restorativeness and wildlife support","Impact":"Patch area, green space size, and spatial configuration can affect mental restoration, wildlife support, and safety perception of green spaces.","Mitigation":"Green space design optimization, strategic site planning, and promotion of diverse habitat structures.","Technologies":"Satellite imagery analysis, habitat modeling tools, and urban planning software.","People":"Urban planners, environmental consultants, landscape architects.","Owner":"Local government, environmental consulting firms, urban planning departments."}]}
